comments.author: raritycheck
comments.created_time: December 17, 2022, 09:56:27 PMLast edit: December 17, 2022, 10:23:42 PM by raritycheck
comments.body: Update: Blurred picture of the coin design has been added. (Design is under Copyright application pending in UK, US and EU)Coin text has been completely blurred to fight against plagiarism because Text from an earlier coin of ours was copied.Coins will have private key in the back and can act as cold-storage. Price in the listing is for unfunded coins. Coins will be shipped on 15th of Feb to all of the pre-sale buyers*Please pm with TxId to reserve the coins (You can include coin loading amount as part of the Txn)* Unless situation changes due to unforeseeable circumstances
